cobyqa.optimize.Quadratic.hess¶

method

optimize.Quadratic.hess(xpt)[source]¶

Evaluate the Hessian matrix of the quadratic function.

Parameters
xptnumpy.ndarray, shape (npt, n)

Interpolation points that define the quadratic function. Each row of xpt stores the coordinates of an interpolation point.

Returns
numpy.ndarray, shape (n, n)

Hessian matrix of the quadratic function.

Notes

The Hessian matrix of the model is not explicitly stored and its computation requires a matrix multiplication. If only products of the Hessian matrix of the model with any vector are required, consider using instead hessp.

cobyqa.optimize.Quadratic.grad
